When you feel anxiety in social situations, focus on what you can control, like your breathing and body language. Over time, you can practice self-compassion and use exposure therapy to reduce fear in social settings.

When you overthink social situations, grounding techniques like deep breathing or focusing on your senses can bring you back to the present. It might help to remind yourself that most people are focused on their own thoughts, not judging you.
